It’s hard to manage a reddit with over 100 posts a day and a game with over 125+ new members a day with 80+ constantly online me and buckey and the other dev lanza are trying to keep up, if anyone wants to keep in contact move over to reddit.[/quote]

i think it is that joshua…

item.title: A GAME "Resurrected" Trugul
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Trugul95, post:32, topic:550566”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=669477.msg4477316#msg4477316 date=1426797046]
How are shitty people and shitty support anything to do with asking someone to post source code. The problem isn’t us, the problem is people coming here with an attitude like yours. You assumed I never knew him, years ago he loved the idea of open source code so why would he be any different now? Especially since you’ve butchered it.
[/quote]

Well 1st off I could simply post a screenshot of our convo now. He says I Didn’t butcher the code considering he says its “wicked” so considering the original creator says I didn’t butcher it then i guess your opinion is irrelevant. 2nd off how about we stay on topic now and have some respect is that to much to ask please?[/quote]
Any exploitable code is butchered.

I’ll have respect for anyone who has it back, if this community and its members are so uneducated and moronic then why would you ask for respect from it? You can’t insult an entire community and then expect it to show courtesy to you.

Read full topic

item.title: A GAME "Resurrected" Trugul
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

[quote=“Trugul95, post:29, topic:550566”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=669477.msg4477189#msg4477189 date=1426707067]

Post the original source code and post your current source code so we can do a comparison

Ask Justin to post here telling us why he doesn’t want it posted. I worked with him for a short amount of time on RCS back in the day, he was all for open source code back then so I strongly doubt he’s going to change for this.
[/quote]

For the final time, I will not post any of the source code as I promised I wouldn’t. I posted this on over 7 forums and reddit all of which have been useful and nice, I was warned about posting on this community due to its “shitty support” and over 10 people said it has “shitty members” all of which is clearly true, so i will be removing this post but here is your proof [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/20fyon5.png /img][/quote]

lol’d

Read full topic

item.title: A GAME "Resurrected" Trugul
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Trugul95, post:16, topic:550566”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=669477.msg4476980#msg4476980 date=1426501983]

[/quote]

Congratz you can cheat… There is no fun in exploiting the game there is a ant-hack system in place however it takes 24 hours to do its stuff the next update will be better though! but its amazing you know. I waited days to post on here and went to reddit first because of this community’s bad reputation (this is only a few people obv) on Reddit with over 200 comments and over 25k page view and no issues. Post here and within 12 hours you get shit.[/quote]
It isn’t really hacking. I just modified the openly available JavaScript values.

cough

^So hard to input that into the JavaScript console. Lemme tell ya.

Read full topic

[quote=“naseem142, post:19, topic:550566”][quote author=Trugul95 link=topic=669477.msg4476985#msg4476985 date=1426509152]

There is kinda no competition, It’s about who came first and stayed longest.

Do not worry! next update includes the following.

-Friends list
-PvP
-Stats reset
-Daily leader boards - Overall leader boards
-Global Bosses
-Researches
-New pickaxes and more
[/quote]

Great

Oh , and it would be nice to add coma’s in big numbers. 500,000 is much easier to read that 500000[/quote]

This is also in the next update
